author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Adam welcomes to the cave 3D artist Ralph Sutter, the digital sculptor of Adam's animatronic Grogu puppet! It's Ralph's first time meeting the physical manifestation of his digital sculpt, and walks Adam through his process and the challenges of capturing the likeness of this beloved Star Wars character. 

Adam's collaborators on this project: 
3D artist Ralph Sutter: https://www.ralphsutter3d.com/ IG: @thebigboss1984 yt: @foxhound1984 
Animatronics engineer Matthew Winchell: https://www.matthewwinchell.com/ IG: @matt.winchell
Nicholas Winstead - cast, eyes, teeth IG: @nicholaswinstead
Ryan Pintar - painter 
Chris Grossnickle - cast cleanup 
Matt Hobbs - Kyber Control Systems: https://www.facebook.com/groups/1341505756182087/
Stephane Beaulieu - kyber control
Chris Stroud - Kinesma IG: @bb8dad
Neal Hutchison - Kinesma 
Adam's prep work on Grogu's animatronic eyes: https://youtu.be/MJYrhD4yabY
Adam Savage's Animatronic Grogu Build Project: https://youtu.be/KGhqvLLQFzY
Adam Savage Bring
title: How Adam Savage's Grogu Puppet Was Sculpted!
